document_data.name: City Guard of Hudid
document_data.mainbody: The '''City Guard''' of [[Hudid]] served as a police force within the city as well as a standing army for the "City of Humility".
document_data.Organization: The composition of the city guard as of {{Yearlink|1367}}{{AQ-time}} was 2,000 regular city guards and 200 [[cleric]]s. An additional 1,000 soldiers and 500 cavalry from the [[Sword of the True Gods]] were also stationed in Hudid. Hudid's navy was relatively new, having only three ships constructed as of 1367 DR.
document_data.Activities: Hudid's growing navy was concerned with the increase in pirate activity on the [[Crowded Sea]].
